fields.name: company_name
fields.label: Company Name
fields.instructions: For the accessibility Statement. This is required.

fields.name: domain
fields.label: Domain
fields.instructions: This is for the accessibility statement. It is required, and cannot be deleted.

fields.name: email
fields.label: Email
fields.instructions: This is for the accessibility statement. It is required, and cannot be deleted.

fields.name: phone
fields.label: Phone
fields.instructions: Used on the accessibility statement, if the client has multiple locations you can the add primary number here or leave this group blank.

fields.name: location
fields.label: Locations
fields.instructions: Add Locations here. This populates the block contact section and footer.

sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.instructions: For multiple practices you can include a practice descriptor here if applicable. For example: "San Jose Location"

sub_fields.name: suite
sub_fields.label: Suite
sub_fields.instructions: Enter Suite or Floor information here. Leave blank if not applicable.

sub_fields.name: phone
sub_fields.label: Phone
sub_fields.instructions: If a practice has multiple locations and uses different phone numbers per location you can include it here. You should leave this section blank if there's only one location or if a practice uses the same number across multiple locations.

sub_fields.name: label
sub_fields.label: Label
sub_fields.instructions: It's advised to not update the default text as it's specific for ADA purposes, however it can be changed here if necessary.

sub_fields.name: special_note
sub_fields.label: Special Note
sub_fields.instructions: If the client has a special note related to the location, eg (wheelchair access info) enter it here. The text appears under the hours section.

sub_fields.name: enable_top_bar
sub_fields.label: Enable Top Bar
sub_fields.instructions: Check this to enable a Navigation Top Bar.

sub_fields.name: type
sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of topbar. Links: Top bar with links (i.e. Address, Phone Number). Announcement: Top bar with modal popup on click.

sub_fields.name: theme
sub_fields.label: Theme
sub_fields.instructions: Light: topbar-light color. Dark: topbar-dark color. (color variables are set in the color.sass file).

sub_fields.name: links
sub_fields.label: Links
sub_fields.instructions: Links and icons in the top bar. It's recommended you check the icon name and confirm it's there before filling out the icon field.

sub_fields.name: announcement
sub_fields.label: Announcement
sub_fields.instructions: Announcement top bar information. Defaults to using notification icon. If using a different icon it's recommended you check the icon name and confirm it's there before filling out the icon field.

sub_fields.name: cta_buttons
sub_fields.label: CTA buttons
sub_fields.instructions: If the client has no CTA in the navigation uncheck this button and it will remove this section.

sub_fields.name: external
sub_fields.label: External?
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, link opens in new window

sub_fields.name: floating
sub_fields.label: Floating
sub_fields.instructions: Uncheck the box below if you want the nav to always have a background. Leave checked for the nav to be "floating" or have no background when at the top of the page.

sub_fields.name: path
sub_fields.label: Path
sub_fields.instructions: If an external link add the href in this field.

sub_fields.name: social_media
sub_fields.label: Social Media
sub_fields.instructions: All of the major social platform icons are included in the template. It's recommended you check the icon name and confirm it's there before filling out the icon field.

sub_fields.name: light
sub_fields.label: Light Version
sub_fields.message: Check here to change the background color of the footer to white.

sub_fields.name: add_border
sub_fields.label: Add Border?
sub_fields.message: Check here to add top border

fields.name: uses_greyfinch
fields.label: Uses Greyfinch?
fields.message: Check this if the practice uses greyfinch for their patient scheduling

sub_fields.name: error_message
sub_fields.label: Error Message
sub_fields.default_value: Please select at least one option.

sub_fields.name: external
sub_fields.label: External?
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, link opens in new window

sub_fields.name: hero_header
sub_fields.label: Hero Header
sub_fields.message: Header & subheader will be h1 & h2 instead of h2 & h3.

sub_fields.name: hide_component
sub_fields.label: Hide Component
sub_fields.message: Check to hide a partially completed component.

sub_fields.name: external
sub_fields.label: External?
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, link opens in new window

sub_fields.name: hero_header
sub_fields.label: Hero Header
sub_fields.message: Header & subheader will be h1 & h2 instead of h2 & h3.

fields.name: hide_component
fields.label: Hide Component
fields.message: Check to hide a partially completed component.

sub_fields.name: error_message
sub_fields.label: Error Message
sub_fields.default_value: Please select at least one option.
